languages.text: "Я не могу передать омерзение от необходимости терпеть ксеноса, но Вольный Торговец в своем праве. Я стисну зубы и слова не скажу против положений священного Патента".

traits.locale_text: "Я не могу передать омерзение от необходимости терпеть ксеноса, но Вольный Торговец в своем праве. Я стисну зубы и слова не скажу против положений священного Патента".

languages.text: "I cannot express my disgust at having to put up with the presence of a xenos, but the Rogue Trader is well within {mf|his|her} right. I will grit my teeth and not say a word against the letter of the sacred Warrant."
languages.original_text: "Я не могу передать омерзение от необходимости терпеть ксеноса, но Вольный Торговец в своем праве. Я стисну зубы и слова не скажу против положений священного Патента".

traits.locale_text: "I cannot express my disgust at having to put up with the presence of a xenos, but the Rogue Trader is well within {mf|his|her} right. I will grit my teeth and not say a word against the letter of the sacred Warrant."

"I cannot express my disgust at having to put up with the presence of a xenos, but the Rogue Trader is well within {mf|his|her} right. I will grit my teeth and not say a word against the letter of the sacred Warrant."

languages.text: 「異種族の存在に耐えねばならぬこの嫌悪感は言葉では言い表せない。だが、ローグトレーダーにはその権利がある。俺は歯を食いしばり、聖なる令状の文言に背くようなことは一切口にしない」
languages.original_text: "I cannot express my disgust at having to put up with the presence of a xenos, but the Rogue Trader is well within {mf|his|her} right. I will grit my teeth and not say a word against the letter of the sacred Warrant."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族の存在に耐えねばならぬこの嫌悪感は言葉では言い表せない。だが、ローグトレーダーにはその権利がある。俺は歯を食いしばり、聖なる令状の文言に背くようなことは一切口にしない」

languages.text: "Ich kann meinem Ekel kaum Ausdruck verleihen, dass ich die Anwesenheit eines Xenos dulden muss. Doch {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} übt nur {mf|seine|ihre} Rechte aus. Ich werde die Zähne zusammenbeißen und nichts gegen die Bestimmungen des heiligen Handelsbriefs sagen."
languages.original_text: "I cannot express my disgust at having to put up with the presence of a xenos, but the Rogue Trader is well within {mf|his|her} right. I will grit my teeth and not say a word against the letter of the sacred Warrant."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann meinem Ekel kaum Ausdruck verleihen, dass ich die Anwesenheit eines Xenos dulden muss. Doch {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} übt nur {mf|seine|ihre} Rechte aus. Ich werde die Zähne zusammenbeißen und nichts gegen die Bestimmungen des heiligen Handelsbriefs sagen."

languages.text: « Les mots me manquent pour exprimer le dégoût que je ressens en étant obligé de côtoyer une xénos, mais {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} est dans son droit. Je me contenterai donc de prendre sur moi, sans protester contre la lettre de marque sacrée. »
languages.original_text: "I cannot express my disgust at having to put up with the presence of a xenos, but the Rogue Trader is well within {mf|his|her} right. I will grit my teeth and not say a word against the letter of the sacred Warrant."

traits.locale_text: « Les mots me manquent pour exprimer le dégoût que je ressens en étant obligé de côtoyer une xénos, mais {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} est dans son droit. Je me contenterai donc de prendre sur moi, sans protester contre la lettre de marque sacrée. »

languages.text: «No puedo expresar con palabras la aversión que me produce la presencia de una xenos, pero {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente está en su derecho. Haré de tripas corazón y no protestaré contra la sagrada Patente».
languages.original_text: "I cannot express my disgust at having to put up with the presence of a xenos, but the Rogue Trader is well within {mf|his|her} right. I will grit my teeth and not say a word against the letter of the sacred Warrant."

traits.locale_text: «No puedo expresar con palabras la aversión que me produce la presencia de una xenos, pero {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente está en su derecho. Haré de tripas corazón y no protestaré contra la sagrada Patente».

languages.text: “我不得不忍受异形的存在，我心里的厌恶哪怕再怎么表达都不为过。不过，这正是行商浪人的特权所在。我必须咬紧牙关，不对神圣授状的规定报以任何怨言。”
languages.original_text: "I cannot express my disgust at having to put up with the presence of a xenos, but the Rogue Trader is well within {mf|his|her} right. I will grit my teeth and not say a word against the letter of the sacred Warrant."

traits.locale_text: “我不得不忍受异形的存在，我心里的厌恶哪怕再怎么表达都不为过。不过，这正是行商浪人的特权所在。我必须咬紧牙关，不对神圣授状的规定报以任何怨言。”

languages.text: "Zenonun varlığı, en hafif tabirle midemi bulandırıyor. Ancak Hür Tacir bu hususta özgür. Ne kadar diş gıcırdatsam da kutsal ruhsatnamenin emrine karşı tek söz söylemem."
languages.original_text: "I cannot express my disgust at having to put up with the presence of a xenos, but the Rogue Trader is well within {mf|his|her} right. I will grit my teeth and not say a word against the letter of the sacred Warrant."

traits.locale_text: "Zenonun varlığı en hafif tabirle midemi bulandırıyor ama Hür Tacir, bu hususta özgür. Ne kadar diş gıcırdatsam da kutsal ruhsatnamenin emrine karşı tek söz söylemem."

languages.original_text: "I cannot express my disgust at having to put up with the presence of a xenos, but the Rogue Trader is well within {mf|his|her} right. I will grit my teeth and not say a word against the letter of the sacred Warrant."
